description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/ouej1 (compensated affiliate link) - Apple's new Airpods sound spectacular with some surprisingly effective (but not perfect) active noise cancellation. See more headphones: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SNmRqnqCnbc&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsvHqEEvGfzvDP8CzI6ifqx and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: Apple Airpods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) Review
